member.name: M:AMLEngineExtensions.BasicExtensions.AddInstance(CAEX_ClassModel.InternalElementType,CAEX_ClassModel.CAEXObject)
member.summary: Inserts a new class instance to the parentInternalElement. If there are existing instances of the same Type, the Element is inserted after the last Element of that Type. Before Insertion, the Uniqueness of the Name among the siblings of that Type is checked.
member.param: The instance of a class to be inserted at the parentInternalElement. The instance can be of type InternalElementType or InterfaceClassType
member.returns: True if insertion was successful, else false (name is not unique or wrong type of newInstanceObject)

member.name: M:AMLEngineExtensions.BasicExtensions.AddInternalElement(CAEX_ClassModel.InstanceHierarchyType,CAEX_ClassModel.CAEXObject)
member.summary: Add an internalElement to the parentInstanceHierarchy. If there are existing internalElements, the Element is inserted after the last Child. Before Insertion, the Uniqueness of the Name among the children is checked.
member.param: The internalElement to be inserted at the parentInternalElement.
member.returns: True if insertion was successful, else false (name is not unique or wrong type of internalElement)

member.name: M:AMLEngineExtensions.BasicExtensions.AddNewInternalElement(CAEX_ClassModel.InstanceHierarchyType,System.String)
member.summary: Creates a new InternalElement and inserts it after the last InternalElement of the parent InstanceHierarchy if the elementName is unique among the childs. The ChangeMode is set to the Value 'Create'
member.param: Parent InstanceHierarchy of the new InternalElement
member.returns: the new InternalElement or null, if the elementName is not unique

member.name: M:AMLEngineExtensions.BasicExtensions.AddNewInternalElement(CAEX_ClassModel.SystemUnitClassType,System.String)
member.summary: Creates a new InternalElement and inserts it after the last InternalElement of the parent if the elementName is unique among the childs. The ChangeMode is set to the Value 'Create'
member.returns: the new InternalElement or null, if the elementName is not unique

member.param: a list of objects which caused errors while validation
member.returns: the number of errors found during validation

member.name: M:AMLEngineExtensions.NavigationExtensions.FindByXPath``1(CAEX_ClassModel.CAEXBasicObject,System.String)
member.summary: Searches a CAEXBasicObject from the given xPath, the type must be given in angle brackets. The search bases on XPath and is slow. For speed optimization, use FindFastByPath instead. If your CAEX file has changed, update the hash tables before using this function using updateCAEXObjectHashLists before.
member.param: The root of the AML subtree to search
member.returns: The object if found, null if not

member.name: M:AMLEngineExtensions.NavigationExtensions.FindByXPath(CAEX_ClassModel.CAEXBasicObject,System.String)
member.summary: Searches a CAEXBasicObject from the given xPath, you must cast the returned CAEXBasicObject into the type you expect. The search bases on XPath and is slow. For speed optimization, use FindFastByPath instead. If your CAEX file has changed, update the hash tables before using this function using updateCAEXObjectHashLists before.
member.param: The root of the AML subtree to search
member.returns: The object if found, null if not

member.name: M:AMLEngineExtensions.NavigationExtensions.FindByXPath``1(CAEX_ClassModel.CAEXFileType,System.String)
member.summary: Searches an object in the whole document that has the given Path. The search bases on XPath and is slow. For speed optimization, use FindFastByPath instead. If your CAEX file has changed, update the hash tables before using this function using updateCAEXObjectHashLists before.
member.param: The root of the AML file
The absolute path to an object
member.returns: The object if found, null if not

member.name: M:AMLEngineExtensions.NavigationExtensions.FindByXPath(CAEX_ClassModel.CAEXFileType,System.String)
member.summary: Searches a CAEXBasicObject from the given path. The search bases on XPath and is slow. For speed optimization, use FindFastByPath instead. If your CAEX file has changed, update the hash tables before using this function using updateCAEXObjectHashLists before.
member.param: The root of the AML file
The absolute path to an object
member.returns: The object if found, null if not

member.name: M:AMLEngineExtensions.NavigationExtensions.FindFastByPath(CAEX_ClassModel.CAEXFileType,CAEX_ClassModel.CAEXObject,System.String)
member.summary: Performs a document wide fast search and returns a CAEXObject given by its ID. It is fast due to hash table support. If your CAEX file has changed, update the hash tables before using this function using updateCAEXObjectHashLists before.

the path ob the object which is subject of the search
member.returns: the found CAEXObject or null if not found

the path ob the object which is subject of the search
